original_text: Every day, he got up early in the morning. Then he went to stand at the side of the road near the city's gate. He called out to anyone who was bringing a problem for the king to judge. He would ask them, ‘Which town have you come from?’ Then the man would tell Absalom which tribe of Israel he belonged to. Samuel 14 Samuel 16
korean_text: 압살롬이 일찍이 일어나 성문 길 곁에 서서 어떤 사람이든지 송사가 있어 왕에게 재판을 청하러 올 때에 그 사람을 불러 이르되 너는 어느 성읍 사람이냐 하니 그 사람의 대답이 종은 이스라엘 아무 지파에 속하였나이다 하면

sentences.original_text: Every day, he got up early in the morning.
Then he went to stand at the side of the road.
He called out to anyone who was bringing a problem.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 문제를 가지고 오는 모든 사람을 불렀습니다.

sentences.original_text: Then the man would tell Absalom
which tribe of Israel he belonged to.
